item.value: assigned ids
Given a bundle container order item, find and return its child order items - or their order item ids when the $return_ids arg is true.
Remove all line items (products, coupons, shipping, taxes) from the order.
Find Room Searches

Select first not sent offer order by id Select client from SQL (using stored procedure if it's complicated) with matching the offer with disable_messages_until > now. Write ID’s of selected clients to room_search_offers field in offer table. Order selected clients by last_message_datetime field so clients with will get messages short time ago will be in the end and clients with get messages long time ago - will be in the beginning. Do foreach Check client notification type push (have subscription and last time successfully sent) -> sms (valid mobile and last time successfully sent) -> email (valid email) In the .env file use 2 variables: messages_clients_in_group, messages_minutes_betwen_groups and add to the messages table according to these variables. If offer is disabled - discard all it’s messages
חמישי - שבת
שישי-ראשון (2 לילות)
disable messages until
message try datetime

We've updated the plugin. Added the ability to hide prices for lots for a certain number of hours after the end of the auction.
Мы обновили плагин. Добавили возможность скрывать цены для лотов на определённое количество часов после окончания аукциона.

Hello! We have updated the plugin. Changed the lines that you asked. Examples are attached to the archive to the letter. We also changed the display of the auction start date, you can change it in the plugin settings. As for the "Provinces for Canada" item, we are solving with the support of Bidspirit. As the issue is resolved, we will update the plugin. Now for the item "Problem with dropdown menu." This is normal behavior when the form (content on the page) is under the dropdown menu.
This is normal behavior when the form (content on the page) is under the dropdown menu.
Это нормальное поведение когда форма (контент на странице) находится под выпадающим меню.
Это нормальное поведение когда форма (контент на странице) находится под выпадающее меню.
goes under the dropdown menu.
Now for the item "Problem with dropdown menu." This is normal behavior when the form (content on the page) goes under the dropdown menu.
As for the "Provinces for Canada" item, we are solving with the support of Bidspirit. As the issue is resolved, we will update the plugin.
Что касается пункта "Provinces for Canada" решаем с тех поддержкой Bidspirit. Как вопрос решится мы обновим плагин.

Hello! We have updated the plugin. Changed the lines that you asked. Examples are attached to the archive to the letter. We also changed the display of the auction start date, you can change it in the plugin settings. As for the "Provinces for Canada" item, we decide from those. Bidspirit support. As the issue is resolved, we will update the plugin. Now for the item "Problem with dropdown menu." This is normal behavior when the form (content on the page) goes under the dropdown menu.

мы обновили плагин. Изменили строки что Вы просили. Примеры приложил в архив к письму. Так же изменили отображение даты начала аукциона, можно поменять в настройках плагина. Что касается пункта "Provinces for Canada" решаем с тех. поддержкой Bidspirit. Как вопрос решится мы обновим плагин. Теперь что касается пункта "Problem with dropdown menu." Это нормальное поведение когда форма (контент на странице) уходит под выпадающее меню.

The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the "state" field does not come to us in response into query users/initSession and we cannot display its value.

The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the "state" field does not come to us in response and we cannot display its value. The Bidspirit user profile has this field, and it comes as a text field, for Israel it is hidden.
The Bidspirit user profile has this field, and it comes as a text field, for Israel it is hidden.
В профиле пользователя Bidspirit это поле есть, и оно идёт как текстовое поле, для Израиля оно скрыто.

The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the "state" field does not come to us in response and we cannot display its value.
The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the state field does not come to us in response and we cannot display its value.
